charges.charge_description: 21:846 - KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY ATTEMPTING TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE 500 GRAMS OR MORE OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF METHAMPHETAMINE; 21:841(a)(1),(b)(1)(B) - KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY POSSESSING WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE 50 GRAMS OF MORE OF A MIXTURE AND SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF METHAMPHETAMINE
